com.korotkevich.provider.pool

Class ConnectionManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.korotkevich.provider.pool.ConnectionManager

  • public class ConnectionManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Class provides methods connected with connection interactions such as commit, rollback, setAutoCommit, statement close with exception check
    Author:
    Korotkevich Kirill 2018-05-10
